attributes.review: i really wanted to support trump because he’s my favorite president, (no he’s not, obama is, dont get too ahead of yourselves) but my phone started to glitch and then it blew up so im writing this 2 kungfu panda 2 DVD’s. don’t worry,  (i hope you get a nightmare and perish) i still love you to death (i wish you could be sentenced with it) but this app needs to be b e t t e r. (please commit fork in outlet.) 😍😍🥰🥰😘🥰😍😘😍🥰 xoxo, a girlie who doesn’t like you 🤪🤪🤪🤪
attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!!!

attributes.review: It literally took me 3 hours long to download this app when I have good WiFi then when I opened the app it kept glitching and kicking me out then I deleted and re downloaded the app again and it still took me another 3 hours and the same thing happened it kept glitching and kicking me I out the app 0/10 this app is completely trash I recommend to not get this app
attributes.title: Bad app

attributes.review: Over the years I’ve lived by the phrase “if at first you don’t succeed, try try again”.❤️whoever created that saying, I don’t think they were talking about you, Mr. Trump 😔✨Upon opening this  app, I instantly projectile vomited all over my mother’s hand crafted 12,000 dollar duvet, which led to me being formally and forcefully kicked out of my house. This app will ruin you, and NO I would not recommend it to a friend 😫😡
attributes.title: Horrible App

attributes.review: This app is the worst app in history!!!!🤬when I went to put in my mobile number number the message said all you have to do is put your password in and thought it was just part of the app so I did also my daughter said she saw a video on tik tak saying that she saw someone get hacked so I said that they were lying but they weren’t so now I’m here with a new phone I WANT A REFUND!!!
attributes.title: My phone got hacked

attributes.review: All i wanted to do was leave a good review and give my dusty cheeto of a president my love and support, even though he doesn’t want it because i’m a woman, but real women vote for trump 😌. this app literally ruined my life! this app caused my goldfish to die this morning. it also caused my husband to leave me for the local crackhead 😞. my life will never be the same and it’s all because of our 1 inch-pinch disgrace of a president.
attributes.title: Literally the worst!!

attributes.review: That oompa loompa built Cheeto Puff does not deserve to be the President of this country and the leader of the free world. Well say bye-bye to your precious campaign app you Bunker B*TCH!!! Ha ha ha loser. I hope you lose the election. Go cry in your “Trump tower” ya big baby! Cause guess what, Tiktok is just ONE platform, we won’t stop till you’re outta office. 😘
attributes.title: DONALD TRUMP IS A WHITE SUPREMACIST

attributes.review: this app took a week to download and when i believed my eyes i saw a orange figure when i was walking home it was getting closer so i started running it ran with me but then he gave up he was a little chubby so he probably gave up i kept running and went to my friends house to take her chocolate and walked home before i saw him again and i recommend not downloading the app
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: this app is just terrible. I mean disgusting. you know, it came into my phone and just took away from the apps that were already living there. it came with violence and lies. it has fake news. all the news that comes from this app is wrong. just terrible. my IQ is so much higher than most people’s so I would know. look it up. 0/10 ... but we Stan tiktok :)
attributes.title: we don’t support idiots

attributes.review: As soon as I opened up the app and started exploring and then my phone started glitching. I had to reset my phone a good 6 times for it to stop. Then as the next few days go by ever time I click on an app it takes me straight off it. But once I delete this Trump at everything went back to normal. I highly recommend you DON’T download it. Worst app ever!
attributes.title: What did I just download !

attributes.review: i don’t like it. i also don’t have my rights to my body taken away as a woman. i don’t like the fact that i can’t walk safely at night alone or even in the daytime. i don’t like natives not being able to have their own land. black people not being able to jog or breathe. lgbtq+ not being able to have a family. and latinos being put in concentration camps, raped, and sex trafficked. and many other basic rights that cis white men take for granted. just because it doesn’t affect you doesn’t mean that you can take somebody else’s rights away. i want my children to grow up in an environment that they can feel safe in. it’s a stupid app too.
attributes.title: stupid ugly app
